text:
URGENT: Volunteers needed! @ASU works w/ @HandsOnPHX & other local partners to register & schedule volunteers to staff the Phoenix Muni & State Farm Stadium vaccination sites & they are in urgent need. #BeTheSolution #COVID19 #Vaccine
 
Sign up: https://t.co/lVbGMbeKf8 https://t.co/aCQAxW2FFj
